title: Wear Mobile Control
summary: Wear Mobile control is app to control your Phone functions using your Watch.

description: Wear Mobile Control is simple application for fast and easy access of your mobile Controls or settings.Using Wear Mobile Control you can do Below Functions from wear as well as Mobile phone.This app is very Useful when you are in meeting and forgot to silent your phone then just one click in Wear and silent phone.Features :Change Setting of1) Wifi(On/Off Wifi in one touch)2) MobileData(On/Off DataPack in one touch)3) FlashLight (On/Off Flash in one touch)4) Phone state	- Ringing	- Silent	- Vibrent5) Screen Autorotate6) Power saving option7) Wifi Hotspot or Wifi tethering (On/Off Flash in one touch)8) Media player Volume set in three state	- Low Sound	- Medium Sound	- High Sound9) Brightness Change	- Low Brightness	- Medium Brightness	- High Brightness	- Auto BrightnessIf you found any bugs or you have any feedback, please email on jezz.developer@gmail.com.Note: Before adding low rating please first give me feed back on above mail id. Thank you.
descriptionHTML:
Wear Mobile Control is simple application for fast and easy access of your mobile Controls or settings.Using Wear Mobile Control you can do Below Functions from wear as well as Mobile phone.
This app is very Useful when you are in meeting and forgot to silent your phone then just one click in Wear and silent phone.

Features :
Change Setting of
1) Wifi(On/Off Wifi in one touch)
2) MobileData(On/Off DataPack in one touch)
3) FlashLight (On/Off Flash in one touch)
4) Phone state
- Ringing
- Silent
- Vibrent
5) Screen Autorotate
6) Power saving option
7) Wifi Hotspot or Wifi tethering (On/Off Flash in one touch)
8) Media player Volume set in three state
- Low Sound
- Medium Sound
- High Sound
9) Brightness Change
- Low Brightness
- Medium Brightness
- High Brightness
- Auto Brightness

If you found any bugs or you have any feedback, please email on jezz.developer@gmail.com.
Note: Before adding low rating please first give me feed back on above mail id. Thank you.
